Text:
I cannot thank you enough for this.
My 23 year old son is a life long Star Wars fan.
His current USMC deployment to Afghanistan will prevent him from seeing this show live.
I'll be sending this to him in the next package.
He'll be able to watch it on the laptop there.
Thank you, thank you, thank you !!!!!
Thank you so much! I missed it when it was live in Paris! I hope they'll do it again someday! A friend was there he told me he almost cried it was too beautiful. I cried because i wasnt there. :)
